name: lambda-api-gateway-example
description: Using the AWS SDK for JavaScript V3 to build and deploy Lambda functions on API Gateway.
author: brmur

scripts.build-lambda-1: webpack getid.js --mode development --target node --devtool false --output-library-target umd -o index.js
scripts.build-lambda-2: webpack additem.js --mode development --target node --devtool false --output-library-target umd -o index.js
scripts.build-lambda-3: webpack sendemail.js --mode development --target node --devtool false --output-library-target umd -o index.js
scripts.build-cdk: aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name STACK_NAME --template-body file://setup.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
